text: Euphorbia erythroxyloides is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Madagascar erythroxyloides Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by John Gilbert Baker
title: Euphorbia erythroxyloides
